entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Add BitArray.CopyTo(Span<byte>) #62680
  • Regex UpdateBumpalong logic should be applicable to lazy loops as well #62677
    7.0.0
  • Regex UpdateBumpalong logic is flawed and likely costing us perf #62676
    7.0.0
  • Regex source generator can use {Last}IndexOf for strings in greedy char loop #62670
    7.0.0
  • Regex source generator can use IndexOf to speed up lazy loop #62669
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] `DebuggerTests.MiscTests.DebugLazyLoadedAssemblyWithEmbeddedPdb` timing out on CI #62667
  • [wasm] `DebuggerTests.ExceptionTests.ExceptionTestAllWithReload` failing on CI #62666
  • Change loop cloning to work with pre-header blocks #62665
    7.0.0
  • StressLogAnalyzer is failing to build #62664

Closed

  • File.SetLastWrite time fails on readonly files on Windows #62602
    7.0.0
  • Libraries 7.0 (master) cross build failed for tizen armel #62478
  • Test failure baseservices\\TieredCompilation\\BasicTestWithMcj\\BasicTestWithMcj.cmd #60381
  • Ignore composite images in Crossgen2 inputs #49247
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/Performance/CodeQuality/Benchstones/BenchF/MatInv4/MatInv4/MatInv4.sh #61899
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Adds BitArray.CopyTo(Span<byte>) #62679
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Remove dummy project property IlasmRoundTrip #62678
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Make StressLogAnalyzer build disablable #62675
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Move a few vendor libraries to src/native/external #62673
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Include properties on records for (de)serialization in source-gen #62668
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1508434 #62663
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Merged

  • Dedup addprefix & delete unused defines from cmake #62528
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Added missed penultimate bytes in `SniHelper_TruncatedData_Fails` scenario #62641
    area-System.Net.Security
  • HTTP/2: Improve incoming header performance #62614
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Fix setting timestamp on Windows on readonly files #62638
    area-System.IO
  • Exclude DNNE based test project from armel builds #62486
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Update spmi asp.net script to collect some osr method contexts #62635
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Skip native composite ReadyToRun images as inputs to Crossgen2 #62537
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Switch over Loader/classloader/TypeGeneratorTests to use merged wrappers #61942
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr

Updated

  • PE loader/image cleanups. No-copy mapping of R2R PEs on Windows. #61938
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Replace CorInfoIntrinsics with NamedIntrinsic #62639
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] updated samples for ES6 and CJS #62292
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • StreamReader sync/async optimizations: ArrayPool, IndexOfAny, ValueStringBuilder #62552
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [arm64] JIT: Redundant zero/sign extensions after ldrX/ldrsX #62630
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Port MD4 managed implementation from mono/mono #62074
    area-System.Security
  • Reconfigure the field sequences for statics #62632
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.FileExtensions` #57434
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Delete `GT_SIMD_CHK` and `GT_HW_INTRINSIC_CHK` #62088
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Including FastFloat in parsing process #62301
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [TODO-List-Cleanup] Delete the quirks #61876
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Stop marking volatile indirections as `NO_CSE` #62043
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Attempt to repro named mutex pal test issue #62655
    * NO MERGE *, area-PAL-coreclr
  • Improve String.Substring performance #62577
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • Port Mono to Raspberry Pi, ship as new linux-armv6 RID #62594
    area-Infrastructure-mono, new-api-needs-documentation
  • SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime Should not open a new stream to obtain a SafeFileHandle #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [Group 5] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Ini` #60368
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration
  • API proposal implementation: DirectoryInfo.Copy / Directory.Copy #62375
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Cleanup, use camel case name conventions of method parameters #62633
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Add NativeAOT to build #62569
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Generalize loop pre-header creation and loop hoisting #62560
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [SUPER DRAFT] New API for invoking JS functions from C# #60765
    arch-wasm
  • Wasm marshaler API for user-defined types; migrate Uri and DateTime to new API #47640
    * NO MERGE *, arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono
  • Change all "unmanaged" (no GC fields) sequential types to have sequential layout. #61759
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [Draft] Make mono runtime tests stop using patching in CI; remove dependency on coreclr #62652
  • Pass HFA/HVA in registers #62623
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoid deadlock with ConfigurationManager #62209
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Do not promote struct locals with holes #62645
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Do not perform vector save/restore around call that will never return #62662
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • C# 10 Global Usings Performance #58279
  • Developers always feel like they are typing the right thing #58276
  • Developers see exactly what they need to in the lightbulb menu #58275
  • Developers can move code with ease #58274
  • Developers can maintain consistent code by defining coding conventions #58273
  • Developers can understand the code they are looking at #58272
  • Developers can find the code and code issues they are looking for #58271
  • Developers can maintain and modify their code #58270
  • Refine and Improve the .NET Tooling Ecosystem #58269
  • Improve .NET Productivity inner-loop performance #58268
  • Developers get guidance on best practices when writing C# or Visual Basic code #58267

PullRequests

Merged

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58280
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58278
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Include any class with methods with attributes in RunTests #58259
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58277
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to main #58231
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Revert "OmniSharp options" #58253
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58264
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/rename_ui_rework #58266
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #58265
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to features/rename_ui_rework #58284
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/vs2022-theme #58283
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #58282
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add and implement `IImplicitIndexerReferenceOperation` #58200
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Range
  • Add support for interpolations in raw string literals. #57979
    Area-Compilers
  • Method group conversion caching redo #57882
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Fix regression of LambdaSymbol.GetHashCode #58247
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Fix stack exhaustion when parsing large regex alternating sequences. #58254
    Area-IDE
  • List patterns: Skip compiler-generated dag nodes for better codegen #57909
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Give some support for generated documents in CodeModel #58241
    Area-IDE
  • IDE code generator service refactoring #58244
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • The problem of re-initializing components during routing. #38966
  • [.NET6] Referencing Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Razor.RuntimeCompilation breaks hot reload for .cshtml files #38965
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries, updates #38964
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef, json, single_query #38963
  • Semi-random JsonException thrown from EndInvokeJS #38962
  • blazor wasm first load after release cause the error . TypeError: NetworkError when attempting to fetch resource. #38961
  • Quarantine CheckUTF8File #38957

Closed

  • CloseOnAuthenticationExpiration Does not exist in class properties #38922
  • Blazor - A question related to the 15547 issue #37477
    Discussions
  • Blazor Slow OAuth iFrame Request #37127
    Discussions
  • [.NET 6 Blazor server] 'Exceeded the maximum byte array transfer limit for a call' when transfer byte array from js to c# #38941
  • Blazor WASM does not load on iOS 10.3.4. #38938
  • [Feature Request] :Improve visual studio snippet feature by using pseudo-random-looking named functions instead of storing pasted codes #38959
  • Configuring multiple authentication schemes using Microsoft Identity Web #38714
    Discussions
  • Problems with using WebSocket in Edge #38929
  • The runtime<->aspnetcore shared src is out of sync #18943

PullRequests

Merged

  • Quarantine CheckUTF8File #38958
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Setting a navigation ID property to null deletes the entity with that property #26968
  • Detect non-nullable NRT properties only when both read and write are non-nullable #26966

Closed

  • Add regression tests for Count after GroupBy #26938
    6.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Static analysis: deconstruction #26969
  • Replace our nullability decoding with the new BCL API #26967

Merged

  • Add regression tests for Count after GroupBy #26939

Updated

  • Static analysis: inconsistent naming and namespaces #26919
  • SQL row value comparison syntax #26936
